title: Create a Custom Report in Google Analytics
description: An analyst needs to create a custom report in Google Analytics that shows sessions and conversion rate by landing page, but only for organic traffic.

tasks.description: In Google Analytics, navigate to the custom report builder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is in the correct section of the tool.
Agent correctly defines the rows of the report.

tasks.description: Set 'Sessions' and 'Goal Conversion Rate' as the metrics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly defines the columns of the report.

tasks.description: Add a filter to only include data where 'Default Channel Grouping' exactly matches 'Organic Search'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully filters the report to show only organic traffic.
